name: Spiral Legend V
description:
• Before purchase

This game has 0 CG images.
This game places emphasis on the player's imagination to create fappability,
with approx. 50 hours playtime for R18 event completion.

  • Please confirm system compatibility via the trial version before purchasing.
  • The save data can be transferred from the trial version to the retail version.
  • Game Overview

An RPG that focuses on its plotline.
Includes 2 heroines with multiple endings and an NTR route.
